original_title: Spock's Beard: The Making of V
overview: A real look inside the recording process of Spock's classic V CD. iIncludes the band recording at Kevin Gilbert's studio, overdubs at Al, Ryo & Neal's houses, lyric writing sessions, kids dancing to Tarkus and Ryo recording the intro for The Great Nothing.
title: Spock's Beard: The Making of V
